page.title: 20COMMUNITY SHILLINGSTONE
page.content: It is a great priviledge to be the Headteacher of Shillingstone School, and to experience at first hand the extra-ordinary goodwill this village community displays towards its members. Those who are ill or bereaved are supported by the village in so many ways and newcomers to the village are made welcome and invited to take part in village functions as soon as they move in. I am sure that the childrens kindness towards each other is a direct result of their parents thoughtfullness towards others. This entry was compiled by the children of Shillingstone School,but would not have been possible without the generous help of a great many members of the community.K.Ashcroft.
